name: Classical Crypto Portrait - The Stream
description:
Classical Crypto Portrait - The Stream
Portraits have been one of the most important motives in painting history. Through time, these portraits gained value not only as some star artistic creations but as a standard for bold statements. Portraits always show us a unique universe. Portraits are a representation of a non-material aspect of life. By taking this last concept, Classical Crypto Portraits became the first NFT’s collection of blurry reinterpretations which came with a single question: What’s the value of art and representation? Is it the idea of ownership?

JPG
2000x1999 px
300 dpi

created by some1fromthefuture.tez
